## MessageHandler class

Agent plugin that provides [IMessageHandler](./core.imessagehandler.md) methods

```typescript
export declare class MessageHandler implements IAgentPlugin
```

<b>Implements:</b> [IAgentPlugin](./core.iagentplugin.md)
